last_episode_to_air.name: And 2 Broke Girls: The Movie
last_episode_to_air.overview: The women and the diner gang prepare for the premiere of the film about Caroline's life; Caroline and Max contemplate their future at the diner.

name: 2 Broke Girls
overview: Comedy about the unlikely friendship that develops between two very different young women who meet waitressing at a diner in trendy Williamsburg, Brooklyn, and form a bond over one day owning their own successful cupcake business. Only one thing stands in their way – they’re broke.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: One's street-smart and working-class born; the other's book smart and nouveau bankrupt. Together, unlikely roommates and unlikelier friends Max and Caroline are two broke girls waiting tables in a Brooklyn diner while trying to save $250,000 to start a cupcake business. It won't be easy, but the pair's outrageous saucy humor and bossoming friendship make chasing the American dream a priceless adventure.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview:
Best friends Max and Caroline are still waiting tables in Brooklyn, but the future looks bright for their start-up business venture. There’s a boost from a famous television personality’s review of Max’s cupcakes, a lucky break in real estate, and a surprise influx of cash, resulting in the grand opening of Max’s Homemade Cupcakes!

But success doesn’t happen overnight. There are rat droppings to be dealt with. Plus ex-boyfriends and a new flame. Not to mention long nights packing a pastry gun. And that eviction notice.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The third season of 2 Broke Girls serves up sweet surprises for two of Brooklyn’s hottest waitresses, Max and Caroline. They’ve got a new cupcake business at the diner’s back walk-up window, and Caroline and Max negotiate a work-study program at the Manhattan School of Pastry: Caroline works in the office so Max can study professional baking. Plus, love – and the aroma of freshly cooked tarts – is in the air! Caroline has the hots for the school’s hunky master chef and Max falls head over sticky buns for the outrageous class clown. The girls still worry about money – but their friendship is worth a million bucks.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The comedic duo that goes together like cupcakes and frosting is back in business and more hilarious than ever! It’s season 4 of 2 Broke Girls where Max and Caroline, friends and roommates who work together at a Brooklyn diner, dish up sarcasm and smarts. They also have their own start-up business selling Max’s Homemade Cupcakes at the diner’s pop-up window, where they dish up the laughs. Lots and lots of laughs.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Caroline sells her life story to a film producer for $250,000.[6] She uses most of the money to expand their old cupcake space into the adjacent pizza shop, converting it into a dessert bar. The remaining $30,000 is used to purchase part ownership of the diner to help Han pay off his debts from gambling on women's tennis. While in Hollywood with Caroline consulting on her life story script, Max meets her second major love interest in the series, a Los Angeles-based "lawyer to the stars" named Randy. Meanwhile, despite her advancing age, Sophie becomes pregnant with Oleg's child

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Sophie and Oleg welcome their baby daughter Barbara to the world. Randy returns to briefly continue his relationship with Max, but it does not work out. Randy wants Max to move to California, but Max, publicly acknowledging her strong friendship with Caroline for the first time, says she cannot do so because she has important people in her life now. Meanwhile, Caroline meets Bobby, a contractor who rebuilds the dessert bar after a storm, and the two start a relationship. By the end of the season, the movie about Caroline's life has been made (albeit with some "creative license" changes), but Caroline destroys a $10,000 on-loan dress at the premiere, which wipes out both her and Max's combined savings and returns them to "broke" status. Randy comes back to New York, this time permanently, and proposes to Max, who accepts

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Max invites Caroline to be her roommate, but their new friendship is jeopardised when Max's boyfriend flirts with Caroline.

episodes.name: And the Break-up Scene
episodes.overview: Thinking she is being helpful, Caroline facilitates Max's breakup with Robbie.

episodes.name: And Strokes of Goodwill
episodes.overview: A battle erupts over a shirt after Max introduces Caroline to shopping at thrift stores; a sarcastic street artist flirts with Max.

episodes.name: And the Rich People Problems
episodes.overview: Caroline asks Max to help her break into her former townhouse to retrieve her much-needed night guard.

episodes.name: And the '90s Horse Party
episodes.overview: Caroline and Max throw a '90s-themed party at the diner to attract rich hipsters and raise money for their cupcake business; Caroline is horrified when her rich ex-boyfriend comes into the diner.

episodes.name: And the Disappearing Bed
episodes.overview: Caroline and Max try to install a Murphy bed in their apartment.

episodes.name: And the Pretty Problem
episodes.overview: Caroline persuades Max to take a cupcake-decorating class.

episodes.name: And Hoarder Culture
episodes.overview: The two take a job cleaning a hoarder's apartment for the extra money; Max learns that Johnny has a secret.

episodes.name: And the Really Petty Cash
episodes.overview: Johnny's girlfriend has a devious plan in mind when she hires Max and Caroline to bake cupcakes for an art show featuring his work.

episodes.name: And the Very Christmas Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Caroline and Max spend Caroline's first broke holiday season working at a department store's Santaland to earn extra money.

episodes.name: And the Reality Check
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline try to find Chestnut a job in order to get him lodging for the winter. Meanwhile, Peach, the mother of the twins Max babysits, auditions for "Real Housewives of TriBeCa".

episodes.name: And the Pop-Up Sale
episodes.overview: When Max's stove breaks, Caroline tries to return some expensive rings to Barney's department store, but discovers her surname is no longer an asset at her former home away from home.

episodes.name: And the Secret Ingredient
episodes.overview: Caroline discovers the secret ingredient to Max's cupcakes whilst in the midst of her new obsession couponing.

episodes.name: And the Upstairs Neighbor
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline's new neighbor draws their suspicion.

episodes.name: And the Blind Spot
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline try to prove their cleaning skills to Sophie so she will hire them for her maid service.

episodes.name: And the Broken Hearts
episodes.overview: When Sophie's (Jennifer Coolidge) beauty overwhelms Earl, Caroline and Max wind up spending Valentine's Day at the hospital; Caroline tries to rekindle an old flame.

episodes.name: And the Kosher Cupcakes
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline have to make kosher cupcakes when they get a gig at a bar mitzvah.

episodes.name: And the One-Night Stands
episodes.overview: Max runs into an old boyfriend, when she accompanies Caroline to see her father in jail.

episodes.name: And the Spring Break
episodes.overview: Caroline and Max spend their spring break dog-sitting at a couple's lavish apartment.

episodes.name: And the Drug Money
episodes.overview: Max convinces Caroline to partake in a clinical drug trial in an effort to raise money to help Caroline’s father.

episodes.name: And the Messy Purse Smackdown
episodes.overview: After promising Earl to drop his tax return in the mail, Caroline learns that Max has never filed, and gets sidetracked trying to help her.

episodes.name: And the Big Buttercream Breakthrough
episodes.overview: The stakes are high when a socialite Manhattan mother hires Max and Caroline to serve cupcakes at her daughter's first birthday party.

episodes.name: And Martha Stewart Have a Ball (1)
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline plan to attend a big fashion gala at the Metropolitan Museum of Art where Martha Stewart is scheduled to be a guest, in an attempt to have her taste their cupcakes and get her seal of approval.

episodes.name: And Martha Stewart Have a Ball (2)
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline plan to attend a big fashion gala at the Metropolitan Museum of Art where Martha Stewart is scheduled to be a guest, in an attempt to have her taste their cupcakes and get her seal of approval.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: One's street-smart and working-class born; the other's book smart and nouveau bankrupt. Together, unlikely roommates and unlikelier friends Max and Caroline are two broke girls waiting tables in a Brooklyn diner while trying to save $250,000 to start a cupcake business. It won't be easy, but the pair's outrageous saucy humor and bossoming friendship make chasing the American dream a priceless adventure.

episodes.name: And the Hidden Stash
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline attempt to keep faith that Martha Stewart, who tasted and liked one of their cupcakes in last season's finale, will call and help support their business. Meanwhile, Caroline loses a lucky keepsake.

episodes.name: And the Pearl Necklace
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline attempt to keep faith that Martha Stewart, who tasted and liked one of their cupcakes in last season's finale, will call and help support their business. Meanwhile, Caroline loses a lucky keepsake.

episodes.name: And the Hold-Up
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline show their true colors when the diner gets robbed. Meanwhile, everyone sees a surprising new side of Han.

episodes.name: And the Cupcake War
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline try to take their cupcake business to the next level by auditioning for the reality cooking show Cupcake Wars.

episodes.name: And the Pre-Approved Credit Card
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline have different ideas on how to handle their new pre-approved credit card.

episodes.name: And the Candy Manwich
episodes.overview: The attractive owner of a local candy store is sweet on Caroline, but she's too embarrassed to date him after she had a mishap in the store.

episodes.name: And the Three Boys With Wood
episodes.overview: Caroline and Max ask two Amish boys to build a barn for Chestnut; Andy makes a discovery about Caroline.

episodes.name: And the Egg Special
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline figure out a surprising fundraising solution when a potential storefront for Max's Homemade Cupcake becomes available for the girls to rent as the two go to great lengths to raise enough money to see their dream come true.

episodes.name: And the New Boss
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline decide to hire an intern to help take care of some of the menial tasks involved with the preparation for opening their new cupcake shop, but Max seems conflicted with her new managerial role as the boss

episodes.name: And the Big Opening
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline host a grand opening celebration at their new cupcake shop, and Max invites her former flames to show off her success.

episodes.name: And the Silent Partner
episodes.overview: When Max sees Sophie depressed after being swindled by the contractor in charge of building her dream house, she offers to make her a silent partner in the cupcake business, but Caroline and Sophie have very different visions for the company.

episodes.name: And the High Holidays
episodes.overview: Desperate for a way to pay their overdue rent, Max and Caroline get involved with a group of of sketchy customers willing to pay top dollar for their cupcakes.

episodes.name: And the Bear Truth
episodes.overview: A relaxing getaway for two becomes an awkward vacation for three when Max, Caroline and Andy spend a weekend together in a cabin in the woods.

episodes.name: And Too Little Sleep
episodes.overview: The diner gang helps Max and Caroline bake throughout the night in order to fulfill a gigantic cupcake order.

episodes.name: And the Psychic Shakedown
episodes.overview: After learning that Candy Andy closed down his shop after their breakup, Caroline visits a psychic for a reading about her love life in the future.

episodes.name: And Just Plane Magic
episodes.overview: When Max lands tickets to a music awards show in Los Angeles, she and Caroline meet rapper 2 Chainz during the cross-country flight on a private jet.

episodes.name: And the Broken Hip
episodes.overview: Caroline and Max pay a steep price for trying to remove a street performer from the entry of their shop.

episodes.name: And Not-So-Sweet Charity
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline ask Caroline's rich but callous aunt for money to save their flailing cupcake shop.

episodes.name: And the Temporary Distraction
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline take office temp jobs. While Caroline tries to climb the corporate ladder, Max deals with a boss who makes inappropriate advances.

episodes.name: And the Big Hole
episodes.overview: Han fires Caroline when she insults his diner, so Max tries to mend their relationship.

episodes.name: And the Worst Selfie Ever
episodes.overview: Caroline is in a tizzy when she develops a rash after a romantic evening with her former boyfriend.

episodes.name: And the Extra Work
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline are invited to be extras on a popular TV show shooting a scene in Han’s diner, but when Caroline catches the director’s eye, he offers her an actual role – with strings attached.

episodes.name: And the Tip Slip
episodes.overview: Caroline’s father asks her to go on a talk show to defend him when a former employee threatens to defame him in a tell-all book.

episodes.name: And the Window of Opportunity
episodes.overview: When Max and Caroline offer to deep-clean a previously hidden part of the diner they discover something that could relaunch their cupcake business.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview:
Best friends Max and Caroline are still waiting tables in Brooklyn, but the future looks bright for their start-up business venture. There’s a boost from a famous television personality’s review of Max’s cupcakes, a lucky break in real estate, and a surprise influx of cash, resulting in the grand opening of Max’s Homemade Cupcakes!

But success doesn’t happen overnight. There are rat droppings to be dealt with. Plus ex-boyfriends and a new flame. Not to mention long nights packing a pastry gun. And that eviction notice.

episodes.name: And The Soft Opening
episodes.overview: Word about a shocking incident involving a celebrity brings customers to Max and Caroline's new cupcake window.

episodes.name: And The Kickstarter
episodes.overview: Caroline tries to raise money for an expensive pair of new pants through an online fundraising site. Meanwhile, Max’s new smartphone comes between her and Caroline.

episodes.name: And The Kitty Kitty Spank Spank
episodes.overview: When Max becomes smitten with an old stray cat that's been hanging around the apartment, Caroline tries to convince her they need to find it a better home. But just when they think they've found one, the cat's fate takes a turn.

episodes.name: And The Group Head
episodes.overview: When Max and Caroline can’t figure out how to use the new cappuccino maker they bought for their cupcake business, they take temporary side jobs as baristas at a coffee house to learn the ropes.

episodes.name: And The Cronuts
episodes.overview: When Max and Caroline start losing business to the new cronut craze (half-croissant, half-donut), they come up with their own trend – cake fries.

episodes.name: And The Piece of Sheet
episodes.overview: Feeling guilty for buying hair extensions with their joint funds, Caroline splurges on a new bedding set for Max but gives the old one to charity, not realizing her old pillowcase has sentimental value.

episodes.name: And The Girlfriend Experience
episodes.overview: After Han emails photos of a stripper’s face to his mother claiming she’s his girlfriend, he begs Max and Caroline to find her and convince her to play his girlfriend when his mother arrives from Korea.

episodes.name: And The 'It' Hole
episodes.overview: When Caroline’s date is a no-show after promising to take her to one of the city’s hippest new restaurants, she and Max decide to take advantage of the hard-to-get reservation.

episodes.name: And The Pastry Porn
episodes.overview: Max decides to apply to the Manhattan School of Pastry and bakes a tart for her entrance exam.

episodes.name: And The First Day of School
episodes.overview: Max attempts to make a good impression on her first day of pastry school, but finds the class clown to be extremely distracting – and intriguing.  Meanwhile, Caroline dresses to impress Max’s handsome teacher, Nicolas.

episodes.name: And The Life After Death
episodes.overview: Caroline attends her former nanny’s funeral, thinking the family will be honored to have her, but quickly finds out they have no idea who she is.

episodes.name: And The French Kiss
episodes.overview: After an incredible make-out session with Max’s pastry school teacher, Chef Nicholas, Caroline finds out something that makes her wish it never happened.

episodes.name: And The Big But
episodes.overview: Max finds herself wanting to be more than just friends with her pastry school partner, Deke. Meanwhile, Caroline is "hot for teacher" - the married Chef Nicholas.

episodes.name: And The Dumpster Sex
episodes.overview: When Deke takes Max to his place after a great first date, his "home" is nothing like she expected. Meanwhile, Caroline feels empowered - then scared for her life - after having a shady car towed from the front of their apartment building.

episodes.name: And The Icing On The Cake
episodes.overview: When Deke invites Max’s friends over for a gathering at his dumpster, Caroline learns an enormous secret about his background.

episodes.name: And The ATM
episodes.overview: Max decides to break up with Deke now that she knows about his wealthy background.

episodes.name: And The Married Man Sleepover
episodes.overview: Caroline asks Max and Deke to join her on her dinner date at Nicolas’s loft to help make sure she doesn’t do anything she might regret. Also, Max and Caroline treat themselves to very special hair appointments.

episodes.name: And The Near Death Experience
episodes.overview: Caroline goes into a tailspin and brings Max into the mix when Nicolas tells her he's going to leave his wife for her.

episodes.name: And The Kilt Trip
episodes.overview: Caroline tries to fit in with Max and the diner gang as they go out to get wild and crazy at the St. Patrick's Day parade, but finds herself longing to practice her former holiday traditions at the Plaza Hotel.

episodes.name: And The Not Broke Parents
episodes.overview: When Deke invites Max and Caroline to join him and his parents for dinner at their home, Max is tongue-tied until his mother confides in her about her secret past.

episodes.name: And The Wedding Cake Cake Cake
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline agree to make a wedding cake for a bride who can’t decide on what style of cake she wants – or much of anything else.

episodes.name: And The New Lease on Life
episodes.overview: When Max and Caroline find out the lease is up on their apartment, they’re forced to find the original tenant and have him re-sign, claiming he still lives there, or risk being evicted.

episodes.name: And The Free Money
episodes.overview: When Caroline and Max join Sophie at the racetrack as guests of Sophie's new bookie boyfriend, Caroline's reignited love for horse racing gets out of hand.

episodes.name: And The First Degree
episodes.overview: When Caroline discovers that Max didn’t graduate high school by failing to show up for only one exam, she decides to help her best friend get her degree – and reconnect with her estranged mother.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The third season of 2 Broke Girls serves up sweet surprises for two of Brooklyn’s hottest waitresses, Max and Caroline. They’ve got a new cupcake business at the diner’s back walk-up window, and Caroline and Max negotiate a work-study program at the Manhattan School of Pastry: Caroline works in the office so Max can study professional baking. Plus, love – and the aroma of freshly cooked tarts – is in the air! Caroline has the hots for the school’s hunky master chef and Max falls head over sticky buns for the outrageous class clown. The girls still worry about money – but their friendship is worth a million bucks.

episodes.name: And the Reality Problem
episodes.overview: A reality show producer approaches Max and Caroline about shooting an episode of 'Keeping Up With The Kardashians' at their cupcake window.

episodes.name: And the DJ Face
episodes.overview: Max is embarrassed when she discovers her Tuesday night boyfriend is a DJ at a grocery chain.

episodes.name: And the Childhood Not Included
episodes.overview: When Caroline accidentally loses Han’s expensive fish while cleaning the tank, Max considers selling a sentimental gift she just received from her mother in order to pay for a new one.

episodes.name: And the Old Bike Yarn
episodes.overview: Caroline takes an abandoned bicycle in order to start a delivery service for their cupcake business, but discovers that Max never learned how to ride one.

episodes.name: And the Brand Job
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline's partnership - and friendship - is almost torn apart when Caroline drags Max to a seminar to help brand their cupcake business.

episodes.name: And the Model Apartment
episodes.overview: When Max and Caroline put their apartment up for rent on AirBnb, claiming it offers an authentic “Williamsburg experience,” a group of supermodels decide it would be a fun place for a girls’ weekend.

episodes.name: And a Loan for Christmas
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline get a bank loan so they can mass-produce their cupcake T-shirts to sell at high-end boutiques. Also, the diner gang poses in Chestnut’s barn as part of a holiday decorating contest Sophie entered.

episodes.name: And the Fun Factory
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline select a factory to produce their cupcake T-shirts, but become suspicious of the work conditions there due to their overly-enthusiastic employees.

episodes.name: And the Past and the Furious
episodes.overview: Caroline is shocked when she receives a Lamborghini for her birthday, which her father ordered for her four years ago. Meanwhile, Oleg has something big planned for Sophie.

episodes.name: And the Move-In Meltdown
episodes.overview: Max, Caroline, Earl and Han help Oleg move into Sophie’s apartment until she begins turning away all of his things.

episodes.name: And the Crime Ring
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline are arrested for breaking into a cute guy’s apartment to recover the rings Caroline left behind after she spent the night.

episodes.name: And the Knock-Off Knockout
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline get into a legal battle with two prep school teens who knocked off their cupcake T-shirts and are selling them.

episodes.name: And the Great Unwashed
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline find out that one of their customers at the diner is actually a successful photographer who has been keeping a secret.

episodes.name: And the Cupcake Captives
episodes.overview: Sophie’s wedding shower is interrupted by a hostage situation and Max and Caroline’s cupcake business gets unwanted attention when a tenant is arrested while wearing their company’s T-shirt.

episodes.name: And the Fat Cat
episodes.overview: A handsome businessman returns Max and Caroline’s missing cat, Nancy, who comes home with a big surprise.

episodes.name: And the Zero Tolerance
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline attempt to bring in extra money to help pay off their bank loan by taking second jobs as a pastry chef and a hostess at a chic restaurant.

episodes.name: And the High Hook-Up
episodes.overview: Max pursues Nashit, a handsome new waiter at The High, despite Joe’s “no hook-up” rule.

episodes.name: And the Taste Test
episodes.overview: When Sophie takes Max and Caroline shopping for their bridesmaids’ dresses, the girls enlist the diner gang’s help to hide the ugliest ones, in the hopes of avoiding complete and utter humiliation.

episodes.name: And the Look of the Irish
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline try to break Nash into the modeling business in an effort to bring in extra money acting as his managers. Also, Sophie and Oleg attempt to keep celibate for 30 days before their wedding.

episodes.name: And the Minor Problem
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline’s attempt to break Nash into the modeling business comes to a screeching halt when his mother arrives from Ireland to retrieve her son.

episodes.name: And the Grate Expectations
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline help launch the new branch of The High at JFK airport, and Sophie discovers that Oleg may have an ulterior motive for wanting to marry her.

episodes.name: And the Disappointing Unit
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline are tasked with retrieving Sophie’s wedding dress from customs and safely transporting it to the church in time for her big wedding.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: The comedic duo that goes together like cupcakes and frosting is back in business and more hilarious than ever! It’s season 4 of 2 Broke Girls where Max and Caroline, friends and roommates who work together at a Brooklyn diner, dish up sarcasm and smarts. They also have their own start-up business selling Max’s Homemade Cupcakes at the diner’s pop-up window, where they dish up the laughs. Lots and lots of laughs.

episodes.name: And The Wrecking Ball
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline team up with the diner staff in a frantic attempt to keep their businesses open when the city targets Han's diner and their cupcake window for destruction. Also, Sophie and Oleg announce that they are trying to have a baby.

episodes.name: And The Gym And Juice
episodes.overview: When the shower at Max and Caroline's apartment breaks, they get part-time jobs at a fancy gym's juice bar and enjoy free use of the locker room. However, their jobs and free showers are jeopardized when Caroline has a run-in with a group of rich moms who are jealous of the attention she's getting from a sexy trainer.

episodes.name: And The Maybe Baby
episodes.overview: When the girls run into Caroline's newly engaged ex, Candy Andy, Caroline wonders if she made a mistake when she sees how much he supports his fiancé's career.

episodes.name: And The Inside Outside Situation
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline's cupcake shop is boycotted after they refuse to sell cupcakes to "I", an artist who wants to put cocktail weenies in them.

episodes.name: And The Escape Room
episodes.overview: Han insists the diner gang attends a mandatory night out in an "Escape Room Club" when he feels they aren't working together as a team. However, once they're locked inside the "Alice in Wonderland"-themed room, they find Han has an ulterior motive.

episodes.name: And The Not Regular Down There
episodes.overview: Max is both puzzled and curious when the new guy she is dating expresses hesitations about intimacy because he is "not regular down there." Also, Sophie and Oleg struggle to get pregnant.

episodes.name: And The Coming Out Party
episodes.overview: When Caroline's grandmother Astrid awakens from a coma with no knowledge of her family's massive money scandal, Caroline attempts to keep the truth hidden for a bit longer by giving Astrid one last fancy luncheon.

episodes.name: And The Basketball Jones
episodes.overview: Oleg's pro-basketball playing cousin comes to town to play a game against Max's favorite team and gifts her with two free tickets, but chaos ensues when the girls interfere with the game and risk ruining their cupcake business' reputation in the process.

episodes.name: And The Sax Problem
episodes.overview: When Earl is not invited to play with his old jazz band at their reunion show, Max and the diner gang join forces in order to get him back on stage performing.

episodes.name: And The No New Friends
episodes.overview: When Max reconnects with an old friend, Caroline’s jealousy inspires her to try to make some new friends of her own.

episodes.name: And The Booth Babes
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline sign up to be "booth babes" in order to get into a huge gaming convention for free. Once inside, they're shocked to see that Han's friend has created video game characters based on them, and demand compensation.

episodes.name: And The Story Telling Show
episodes.overview: Caroline shares her riches-to-rags life story on stage at a storytelling night and captures the attention of a Hollywood studio executive. Meanwhile, Sophie and Oleg search for a surrogate.

episodes.name: And The Lost Baggage
episodes.overview: Max tags along with Caroline as she travels to Los Angeles on a film studio’s dime to discuss the idea of making her riches-to-rags life story into a movie. While there, Max loses her luggage but finds a new crush.

episodes.name: And You Bet Your Ass
episodes.overview: Caroline continues meeting with studio writers in an effort to make her  life story into a movie, but she is torn when they reveal they would not  portray Max in the project. Also, Max is being spoiled by her new  Hollywood beau, Randy, who sets Caroline up on a date with  his friend, Bob.

episodes.name: And The Great Escape
episodes.overview: As Max pet-sits Randy’s dog, Bruno, and Caroline sets up meetings with  actresses who are interested in playing her in the potential biopic,  Bruno escapes while a cannibalistic serial killer is loose in their  neighborhood.

episodes.name: And The Pity Party Bus
episodes.overview: The girls’ Hollywood adventure continues as Caroline signs away the rights to her life story so it can be turned a movie. Also, Max is heartbroken when Randy breaks up with her via his therapist, Elliot, and Caroline rents a party bus in an attempt to cheer her up.

episodes.name: And The Show and Don’t Tell
episodes.overview: When the girls go to prison to see Caroline’s father, Martin, perform in a musical, they tell him their plan to use Caroline’s movie money to convert their cupcake window into a dessert bar.

episodes.name: And The Loophole
episodes.overview: When the girls decide to look for a larger space for their dessert bar, Han sets them up with Evie, a real estate agent who has a crush on him. Also, Max is on the fence when Randy surprises her at the diner hoping to patch up their relationship, so she tells Caroline to decide for her.

episodes.name: And The Attack of the Killer Apartment
episodes.overview: In an attempt to get to know Max’s world better, her boyfriend Randy asks to spend a night at her apartment. Also, Caroline works on getting a liquor license for their dessert bar.

episodes.name: And The Partnership Hits The Fan
episodes.overview: When a law firm courting Randy for a job invites Randy and Max to dinner at a hip new restaurant, the evening veers off course when their eclectic cuisine doesn’t sit well with Max.

episodes.name: And The Ten Inches
episodes.overview: When Max and Caroline need more space for their renovated dessert bar, they’re willing to do just about anything to convince Angie, the brash owner of the pizza place next door, to rent them her back office.

episodes.name: And The Big Gamble
episodes.overview: When Max and Caroline discover that Han is in hot water after amassing substantial debt that he cannot repay from gambling on women’s tennis, the diner gang rallies to help him.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Caroline sells her life story to a film producer for $250,000.[6] She uses most of the money to expand their old cupcake space into the adjacent pizza shop, converting it into a dessert bar. The remaining $30,000 is used to purchase part ownership of the diner to help Han pay off his debts from gambling on women's tennis. While in Hollywood with Caroline consulting on her life story script, Max meets her second major love interest in the series, a Los Angeles-based "lawyer to the stars" named Randy. Meanwhile, despite her advancing age, Sophie becomes pregnant with Oleg's child

episodes.name: And the Two Openings: Part One & Part Two
episodes.overview: As Max and Caroline, now part owners of the diner, put the finishing touches on their newly converted Dessert Bar, Max deals with the aftermath of her recent breakup with Randy, and Sophie and Oleg prepare for the birth of their baby.

episodes.name: And the 80's Movie
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline’s plans to attract a more sophisticated clientele to their dessert bar take a turn when Max befriends a bouncer whose team of arm wrestlers becomes their latest patrons. Also, Max and Randy continue to text each other, but when she runs out of sexy messages to send him, Oleg offers to be her ghost writer.

episodes.name: And the Godmama Drama
episodes.overview: Oleg and Sophie’s plan to have Max and Caroline as Barbara’s godparents is derailed when Oleg’s domineering mother, Olga, arrives from the Ukraine for the baby’s baptism and fires Max and Caroline from their godparent duties.

episodes.name: And the College Experience
episodes.overview: When Caroline and Max are invited to speak about their business at Caroline’s alma mater, the University of Pennsylvania, Max takes the opportunity to give Caroline the college partying experience she never had. Also, Oleg’s attempts to bond with baby Barbara are rebuffed by a possessive Sophie, and Han practices his magic tricks with a reluctant Earl as his assistant.

episodes.name: And the Rom-Commie
episodes.overview: Earl becomes concerned he may not be able to keep up when his long lost sweetheart, Pilar, visits from Cuba, and wants him to take her sightseeing around the country. Also, Max must decide whether it’s time to take her texting relationship with Randy to the next level.

episodes.name: And the Sophie Doll
episodes.overview: When the girls take a bartending class in order to add cocktails to their dessert bar menu, Caroline must think quickly when she has to take the class exam solo after Max gets chicken pox from Han. Also, Sophie creates a creepy lookalike video monitor doll to keep tabs on baby Barbara.

episodes.name: And the Duck Stamp
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline's dessert bar business booms when they hire Clint, a popular bartender, but the girls need to intervene when Han becomes addicted to the mixologist's potent cocoa powder in his signature cacao drink. Also, Han enters a duck stamp-drawing contest, and glamour eludes Sophie as she adjusts to being a mom.

episodes.name: And the About Facetime
episodes.overview: When Randy and Max get tired of Caroline being the third wheel on their FaceTime dates, Randy sets her up with one of his co-workers. Also, Oleg is distraught when Sophie tells him to trade in his beloved car for a minivan.

episodes.name: And the Himmicane
episodes.overview: When a hurricane approaches the area, Caroline fears that a big divorce party she's planning for a wealthy couple will get broken up when the unhappy pair get stranded in close quarters at the dessert bar. Also, Max worries that Randy really did break up with her when she suspects he’s blocking her calls, and Oleg is jealous when Sophie is stuck at home during the storm with their handsome new "manny".

episodes.name: And the Planes, Fingers and Automobiles
episodes.overview: When Max decides to head to Los Angeles to win back Randy, she and Caroline embark on a cross-country road trip with Han at the wheel. Also, while Han and the girls are away, Oleg takes charge of the diner, and Sophie fills in as a waitress.

episodes.name: And the Riverboat Runs Through It
episodes.overview: As Max and Caroline's road trip misadventures continue, their lack of money finds them stowing away and waitressing on a riverboat to New Orleans as Max tries to reach Randy in Texas. Back at the diner, Oleg and Sophie rake in big bucks when they sell pony rides with Chestnut.

episodes.name: And the Stalking Dead
episodes.overview: Max and Caroline get their big break when they’re cast as zombie extras after they finally arrive at the movie set in Texas where Randy is working. Back at home, Han and Oleg try their hand at construction after they fire the contractor working on the dessert bar.

episodes.name: And the Emergency Contractor
episodes.overview: When Max and Caroline get home from their road trip, Caroline discovers she likes the dessert bar renovations as much as she likes Bobby, the contractor on the job. Also, Max rushes to Randy’s side when she hears he’s in the hospital in New York City, and Sophie joins a mommy group that cares more about partying than baby talk.

episodes.name: And the Turtle Sense
episodes.overview: Caroline is excited to go out on her first date with Bobby, but she has nervous jitters when she realizes Max will be alone and in charge of the dessert bar for the first time. Also, Sophie and Oleg decide to mix things up and go out on a date instead of staying in.

episodes.name: And the Tease Time
episodes.overview: As Caroline prepares for her third date with Bobby, she decides to spice things up by taking a burlesque class accompanied by a reluctant Max, who decides to give up sex in the wake of her breakup with Randy. Also, Max decides to take up a new hobby and goes golfing with Han.

episodes.name: And the Jessica Shmessica
episodes.overview: When Bobby invites Caroline to a party to meet his family, she is eager to make a good impression but isn’t prepared for the torch that his mother and sisters still carry for Bobby’s ex-girlfriend. Also, Caroline’s nerves are even more frayed when the diner gang decides to tag along.

episodes.name: And the Dad Day Afternoon
episodes.overview: When Han's new therapist suggests that Max needs to confront her "daddy issues" and fear of intimacy, she reluctantly heads to Rhode Island to track down her birth father with the diner gang in tow. Also, Oleg is up in arms when Sophie wants him to help out around the house.

episodes.name: And the Baby and Other Things
episodes.overview: When Caroline encourages Bobby’s sister, Denise, to quit her job, the couple heads toward their first fight after Caroline realizes the company Denise works for is her mother’s. Also, after Max reads a text on Bobby’s phone suggesting he has a child with his ex, Jessica, she and Han go undercover as an engaged couple to Jessica’s wedding planning shop to find out the truth.

episodes.name: And the Alley-Oops
episodes.overview: Caroline makes an effort to support Bobby's love of bowling but fears she is his bad luck charm when things go awry; Sophie worries baby Barbara is not smart enough.

episodes.name: And the Rock Me on the Dais
episodes.overview: Caroline's ex-boyfriend, Candy Andy, shows up at a press junket being held to promote the film about Caroline's life; Bobby gets jealous over Caroline and Candy Andy's reconnection.

episodes.name: And 2 Broke Girls: The Movie
episodes.overview: The women and the diner gang prepare for the premiere of the film about Caroline's life; Caroline and Max contemplate their future at the diner.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Sophie and Oleg welcome their baby daughter Barbara to the world. Randy returns to briefly continue his relationship with Max, but it does not work out. Randy wants Max to move to California, but Max, publicly acknowledging her strong friendship with Caroline for the first time, says she cannot do so because she has important people in her life now. Meanwhile, Caroline meets Bobby, a contractor who rebuilds the dessert bar after a storm, and the two start a relationship. By the end of the season, the movie about Caroline's life has been made (albeit with some "creative license" changes), but Caroline destroys a $10,000 on-loan dress at the premiere, which wipes out both her and Max's combined savings and returns them to "broke" status. Randy comes back to New York, this time permanently, and proposes to Max, who accepts
